name: J&J Snack Foods Corp.
description: J&J Snack Foods Corp. is a leading producer of snack foods and beverages in the United States, primarily known for its innovative and high-quality products. Founded in 1971, the company has expanded its portfolio to include a diverse range of snacks, including pretzels, frozen novelties, and beverage products. J&J Snack Foods is particularly recognized for its flagship brands, such as Super Pretzel, Icee, and Luigi's Real Italian Ice. The company operates through several segments, including Frozen Beverages, Soft Pretzels, and Novelty Ice Cream, catering to a variety of markets including food service, retail, and vending. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, J&J Snack Foods continues to invest in product development and innovation, ensuring that it meets the evolving tastes and preferences of consumers. The company also emphasizes sustainable practices in its operations, aiming to reduce its environmental impact while delivering delicious and safe food products. With a strong distribution network and partnerships with major retailers and foodservice operators, J&J Snack Foods is well-positioned to capture growth opportunities in the snack food industry.

seo.meta_title: J&J Snack Foods Corp. | Innovative Snack Foods and Beverages
seo.meta_description: Discover J&J Snack Foods Corp., a leading producer of snack foods and beverages. Explore our innovative products and commitment to quality.

faq.question: What does J&J Snack Foods produce?
faq.answer: J&J Snack Foods produces a variety of snack foods and beverages, including frozen beverages, soft pretzels, and novelty ice cream.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of J&J Snack Foods?
faq.answer: Gerald B. Shreiber is the CEO of J&J Snack Foods Corp.

faq.question: Where is J&J Snack Foods headquartered?
faq.answer: J&J Snack Foods is headquartered in Pennsauken, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: What are some popular products from J&J Snack Foods?
faq.answer: Popular products include ICEE, Super Pretzel, and Luigi's Real Italian Ice.

faq.question: When was J&J Snack Foods founded?
faq.answer: J&J Snack Foods was founded in 1971.
